name: ITX 215.01.E - PAYE Withheld Part 1
query:
select 
min(ss.start_date) as "Start Date::100", 
max(ss.end_date) as "End Date::100", 
ss.employee_name as "Employee Name::180",
sum(if (sd.salary_component = 'Basic', sd.amount, 0)) as "Basic Salary:Currency:120",
sum(if (sd.salary_component = 'Housing', sd.amount, 0)) as "Housing:Currency:120",
sum(if (sd.salary_component = 'TI', sd.amount, 0)) as "Other Allw and Benefits:Currency:120",
sum(ss.gross_pay) as "Gross Pay:Currency:120",
sum(if (sd.salary_component = 'NSSF', sd.amount, 0)) as "NSSF:Currency:120",
sum(if (sd.salary_component = 'PAYE', sd.amount, 0)) as "PAYE:Currency:120",
ss.company as "Company::180"
from `tabSalary Slip` ss  left outer join `tabSalary Detail` sd on sd.parent = ss.name 
group by ss.employee_name
having sum(ss.gross_pay) > 0
